title: MUNGODE ALLAH (MY GOD, OUR PROVIDER)
author: Traditional Hausa liturgical chant
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (regional Hausa liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Domin ka kawo mu a wa nara nayo
Domin ka kawo mu a wa nara nayo

sections.title: Chorus
content: Mungode Allah, Mungode Allah, Mungode Allah

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Daye wa suke, abu buwa n da Kabamu
Daye wa suke, abu buwa n da Kabamu

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Daye wa suke, jin dadin da kabamu
Daye wa suke, jin dadin da kabamu

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Daye wa suke, Al barka n da Kabamu
Daye wa suke, Al barka n da Kabamu

sections.title: Verse 6
content: Da Ku. hassKen rana, da Kabamu
Da kuma hasken rana, da Kabamu

sections.title: Verse 7
content: Da kuma iska nda mu karbi, da Kabamu
Da kuma iska nda mu karbi, da Kabamu
